about_the_game:
Greetings, I am Yui Yuko, the producer of Heroes of Fate, and in addition to fixing and optimizing various gameplay issues during this time, I also bring you our second Dlc, Dark Earth, which tells the story of how you received an important clue from the Patrol Wing Society, and how it is said that there is an ancient city in the middle of the Orofani ruins, and underneath the ruins lies a mysterious tomb that may hold secrets about the witch demon Arna. Orofani - it is customary to refer to this place as the Dark Earth, the land of the dead, where parts of it are still surrounded by a deadly miasma. But in order to uncover the truth about the Witch-Demon Arna, you resolutely set out on a journey to Orofani .......

The new content is as follows:

[New Levels]

New level "Dark Earth", this time we are in the land of the dead, the map has added a lot of new map elements, different types of monsters 18 + types of monsters, there are about 9 new bosses.



[New Events]

At the same time this new Dlc also added a lot of new events for you to explore, "the cursed town", "strange dreams", "the Wizard of Oz" and so on 18 + or so new There are 18+ new events for you to explore!



[New Professions]

This Dlc we have added 2 brand new professions

1. Martial Artist
Background: Liu Yue, a mysterious and charismatic martial artist, claims to be from the faraway land of Xia and can use a strange skill called Qi. After a shipwreck, she wakes up in the strange continent of Milliporea.
In order to find her way home, Liu Yue joined the Wings Guild. Because of her exceptional combat skills, Liu Yue quickly became an outstanding adventurer. However, as she gets to know this new continent, Liu Yue has vaguely realized that this is not the same world as her hometown. ......



2. Berserker
BACKGROUND: Uma was born in a barbarian tribe on the continent of Banam. It was when Uma was 16 years old that the gears of fate began to turn. The covenant of Temporary Yomi was broken, and war came once again. The tribes fought brutally for scarce water and territory. Uma's tribe was destroyed by the enemy, and both of her parents died heroically in the battle.
Though Uma survived, she was captured as a slave and became a gladiator in the arena. In the arena, she spent ten grueling years, each day a test of life and death combat. However, it was because of her unyielding fighting spirit and superior fighting skills that Uma eventually gained her freedom.
After becoming free, Uma decided to leave her hometown and embark on a journey to find the meaning of existence. She traveled alone to the continent of Milliporea.

[New Pets]


1. Fairy Spirit Princess
Everyone's favorite Fairy Spirit Princess has finally been taken out as a pet la!!!!



2, Divine Dragon
Powerful pet, and happy year of the dragon to all of you! All the best!

content_descriptors.notes: Note: The game contains violence/beating, etc.
